name: @qavajs/demo
description: demo repository that demonstrates framework capabilities

scripts.build: npm run build-cli && npm run build-steps-wdio && npm run build-steps-config-loader && npm run build-steps-memory
scripts.build-cli: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/cli && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/cli && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/cli/node_modules
scripts.build-steps-config-loader: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader/node_modules
scripts.build-steps-wdio: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio/node_modules
scripts.build-steps-memory: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-memory && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-memory && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/steps-memory/node_modules
scripts.build-steps-api: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-api && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-api && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/steps-api/node_modules
scripts.build-template: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/template && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/template && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/template/node_modules
scripts.build-validation: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/validation && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/validation && rimraf node_modules/@qavajs/validation/node_modules
